name: Sol Memory Simulator
description:
THIS GAME IS WHERE YOU CAN EXPLORE MY MEMORIES ON YOUR COMPUTER! CLICK AND POINT AND EXPLORE THEM!

MAC USERS! --- IF GAME GIVES ERROR "damaged files" do this:

1. put the game in applications folder from finder

2. ONLY DO STEP IF ON M1 MAC (the macs made 2020 or later)!  right click the game icon and click "get info".  check box "use rosetta", exit.

3.  use finder to find terminal

4. open terminal and paste the following:

xattr -cr /Applications/SolMemorySimulator.app

DONE!
